name: JLOOP
description:
JLOOP is an award-winning creative technology and development firm that specializes in creating memorable online experiences, primarily in the mobile-centric space.
Understanding how creative and technology work together, we get it when it comes to marketing and branding and regularly create initiatives that drive human consequence by inspiring people to take action.
As a company, JLOOP brings over fifteen years of operational experience helping our clients succeed online and in the mobile space. We know how to get the most out of our partnerships, and how to keep project momentum moving. We are an integrated team, with all the skills in house to provide responsive service and quality execution.
